page.title: 19Life Style
page.content: The old people living this area can be divided into two categories -those who have lived all their lives in the area, rarely moving outside its boundaries; the others being people who have moved into the area, commuting and then retiring. One of the old locals had this to say about his life. He was born in the house in which he still lives - his parents and grandparents having lived there before him. One of seven children, living in four rooms (it has since been extended) with oil lamps until l950, outside toilet and no running water until l95l. Before this "we went to the spring for water". He now has a bathroom and inside toilet. He remembers seeing his first aeroplane and the first bus in the area in l936. He clearly remembers seeing horse drawn ploughs
